basics.name: Example Human
basics.label: Unemployed
basics.summary: I enjoy solving problems, main reason why I ended up studying in Mathematics and Statistics.  Recently two my latest hobbies is learning more about deep learning and coding competiitions. Learning more about these two topics has given me exposure on how different algorithms and are used to create solutions.

projects.summary: The goal was to extract features from images of the different things. These features were used to classify the different types of thing. The data for this project was provided  from an open competition (National Data Science Bowl) on Kaggle.
highlights: Using a mixture of edge detection methods was able to extract the outline of the different things.

education.institution: Human Location State University, Human City

publications.name: Statistical Modeling through Analytical and Monte Carlo Methods of Human Things
